thread.title: Field Museum extends 'Mammoths and Mastodons' exhibit
thread.title_full: Field Museum extends 'Mammoths and Mastodons' exhibit - seattlepi.com

author: seattlepi.com
title: Field Museum extends 'Mammoths and Mastodons' exhibit
text:
CHICAGO (AP) â€” A popular exhibit at Chicago's Field Museum has been extended, giving visitors more time to learn about Ice Age mammals.
The museum announced Tuesday that its "Mammoths and Mastodons" exhibit will run through Jan. 3 instead of closing in September as originally planned. The museum is keeping the exhibition running because of its popularity.
"Mammoths and Mastodons" debuted at the Field Museum in 2010 and has toured to other museums. It explores the world of the giant creatures through fossils, prehistoric artwork and touchable life-size replicas. Visitors learn about the connection between mammoths and mastodons and their modern cousins, elephants.
The exhibit requires a separate admission fee. Tickets can be purchased online at the museum's website.
___
Online: http://www.fieldmuseum.org/
